name: Alice in GDX-land
description:
"Alice in GDX-land" project uses some storyline features of the "Alice in Wonderland" book, however to adapt to this short game jam format - do not take it too seriously. Game has 3 levels only.

Use WASD or arrows to move and jump. Use Spacebar to smack something with your parasol.

This project was entirely made for the 1 week game libGDX Jam in March 2021 with theme "Alice in Wonderland".

Game was made using libgdx-graph as a rendering engine, and libgdx-entity-editor for level and templates editor.

libgdx-entity-editor is a GUI tool for as-generic-as-possible editing of entities, templates and/or levels. It's currently under heavy development.
